transcript: The episode begins in one of Watson's dreams he is having a dream about the war. It's a nightmare and very violent
and he wakes up in a cold sweat and is very distraught and begins to sob.
I believe the next scene he is talking to his therapist about his issue with post traumatic stress. He reads something she write upside down and she makes a comment why did you do that.

then we cut to a scene where we see a capsule with white granuals and pink poka dots. Then we see him hudled in a fetal position in a gutted warehouse, apartment building or office.

After the scene with the therapist, he is walking out of the office and he runs into a friend so they sit down on a park bench to have some coffee it comes out that Watson is looking for a flat. He doesn't have a lot of money so his friend brings him to Sherlock Holmes flat.
We see Sherlock doing some work on some type of science experiments.

So he let's him come in , and they go into Sherlock's office or lab Sherlock has to borrow a phone so Watson offers his phone. Sherlock always asks Watson Iraq or Afghanastan? Watson wonders how he knows that he was in the war. Watson is very credulous at first and then Sherlock shows his deduction skills by drawing a bunch of conclusions about how Watson stands and hold his head. Sherlock paints a picture of Watson's life.

Now we are back to reality to present time. Sherlock and Watson agree to go look at a flat together, I think it is 122B Baker Street. Sherlock leaves the room and Watson asks the land lady for a cup of tea and she says just this once and I am not your housekeeper, he asks for biscuits and she says I am not your housekeeper.

Sherlock starts feeling the coat and it is wet. Something else is dry . Some of her jewelry is clean and her wedding ring isn't clean but the underside is which she takes it off a lot which means she is having an affair. He is drawing conclusions about her.

He is able to deduce she must be in the media because she is wearing a weird color pink, HE deduces that she must have traveled 3 hours away. Because her coat is wet. Sherlock is excited and he knows there is a serial killer. He runs down the stairs. How do you know and something about the color pink.

I forgot this part where earlier after the crime scene Watson is walking home and every pay phones starts ringing. So he picks up the third one and this weird guy on the phone tells him to get in the car.
So he gets in and they take him to a warehouse where he meets this guy in a suit.
HE says he is Sherlock's nemisis and offer him money to spy on him.

He calls the serial killer with her phone. He said what happened I must of blacked out. He makes Watson drive across town to send the text message for him. Watson is a little annoyed but he sends the text and gets a call back.
Watson reveals back at Sherlock's apartment Sherlock is getting ready to leave. Watson lets him know that everyone is saying he should stay away from Sherlock.
